data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Dingxi words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Dingxi, Gansu, China

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 842 believers in Dingxi to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 842 believers in Dingxi against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Father, we pray that the county of Dingxi be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Dongxiang people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Dongxiang people know you.
Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Dingxi, Gansu, China.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Dingxi, Gansu, China so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.section_summary:
the county of Dingxi, Gansu, China has a population of 11,100.

We estimate Dingxi has 842 people who might know Jesus, 179 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 10,079 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the county of Dingxi, Gansu, China. Please, stir the 842 believers here to pray for awakening.

location.name: Dingxi
